description: This file defines the NoteEditActivity class, an Android activity allowing users to edit or create notes, interact with a NoteViewModel, and handle save/delete actions.

classes.name: NoteEditActivity
classes.description: An Android activity for editing or creating notes with save and delete functionality.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and loads note data if available.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu options and adjusts visibility based on note presence.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections for saving or deleting notes.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Validates input and inserts or updates the note via ViewModel.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the current note if it exists.
